messages.body: $SRPT About to turn green and rocket in few minutes.

$SRPT I’m not going to get mad, I’m just going to be strategic, but it’s absurd that this is being shorted so drastically and probably will continue to be shorted when their DMD work is pristine. I won’t get angry, I won’t get angry, I won’t get angry. 😁
$SRPT PPMO info out before year end and GT results out beginning of 2021, some good catalysts ahead! Good luck longs, we'll have our day soon!
$SRPT Bought 50 more shares @ 122.70

$SRPT Whichever hedge and brokers shorting this are in for a rude surprise. This shorted price action is NOT scaring longs at all but giving them an opportunity to add and buy MORE. I added more yesterday. Good luck on the covering, you will need it.
$SRPT wow..all this due to a delay? Don’t like it but riding this out for sure
$SRPT Right back to Doug last purchase price. Makes you wonder.
$SRPT Volume was 100% over average volume yesterday. Think we catapult up from here bought more cheap shares yesterday!

$SRPT stupid cheap prices based on every conceivable timeline risk right before phenomenal data.  Prices now will look even stupider come Q1 '21.  Any BO is pending 103 and Ph2 (probably most likely), or will wrap up in the next few weeks b4 PPMO release.  Roche WILL buy something else.  due diligence is a bitc#%, and theyve already done a ton on sarepta!
$SRPT Doug showing a lot of confidence on this call.  Ph2 data will be slam dunk imo (fingers crossed).
$SRPT Conference time in 15 minutes.
$SRPT and now its favorite color red. Market heading lower

$CAPR bought $CAPR at $12 because Stockswits gurus said $CAPR 's $78m cap is a mismatch with $SRPT's $9.9 Billion because they both have the huge effective drug to treat DMD.  Now CAPR is at $4.27 
 
Now bought $ONCT at $5.82 because Stockswits gurus said $ONCT's market cap is a mismatch with VeloBio's $2.7b. Let us see where it ends in a week after the offering.
$SRPT 🖕you 2
$SRPT $BNTX rna technology rocks.
$SRPT how the fxck we dropped $20 in one day, that is ridiculous. Perhaps now is time $RHHBY to act ! Come on Doug, dead money for way too long
$NOVN btw look at $SRPT $GEN $ALT

$SRPT 

Big reversal coming today !!!

$CAPR dmd aa cap 1002 will take us to the promised land.  Let’s do this for the dmd boys it’s impossible to do a phase 3 in this pandemic you see it happen with $srpt.  One patient got covid snd it’s over.  Lots of risk
$SRPT Nice pump to $139.30  Then shorting this all the way down to $61.22💪

$SRPT $IOVA $BLUE $VYGR $RGNX 
FDA gene therapy holdups suggest closer scrutiny by agency

links.title: FDA gene therapy holdups suggest closer scrutiny by agency
links.description: The Food and Drug Administration cleared the first two gene therapies for inherited diseases in short order, with just a year and a half separating historic approvals for the blindness treatment Luxturna and the spinal muscular atrophy drug Zolgensma.

messages.body: $SRPT Stck is gonna shoot up 🚀 hopefully I have my dough 💴 ready to buy the he’ll  out of the newbies weak hands.

$CAPR if you think $ONCT's $88m market cap is a mismatch with VeloBio's $2.7b, then $CAPR 's $78m cap is even more a mismatch with $SRPT's $9.9 Billion because they both have the huge effective drug to treat DMD.  
Should I put some money into $CAPR ?

Biogen's Aducanumab Fails To Win FDA Panel Backing $BIIB Also $LLY $SRPT https://talkmarkets.com/content/stocks--equities/biogens-aducanumab-fails-to-win-fda-panel-backing?post=284606

links.title: Biogen's Aducanumab Fails To Win FDA Panel Backing
links.description: Biogen Inc. ( BIIB) failed to win the backing of the FDA panel which reviewed the BLA for its controversial Alzheimer's drug aducanumab, an antibody which targets amyloid-beta.
